title: Live updates: Lebanon reels after Israeli strikes kill nearly 500 in deadliest day since civil war

Australia’s two largest supermarket chains sued over fake-discount claims
content: The country’s regulator found that Woolworths and Coles hiked the price of Oreos, Kleenex and other staples before cutting them to create “illusory” discounts.
summary: The country’s regulator found that Woolworths and Coles hiked the price of Oreos, Kleenex and other staples before cutting them to create “illusory” discounts.

title: López Obrador changed Mexico — but not in the ways he promised
content: The president’s support for the working poor was wildly popular. But he left much of his predecessors’ policies in place, and corruption, violence and impunity remain rampant.
summary: The president’s support for the working poor was wildly popular. But he left much of his predecessors’ policies in place, and corruption, violence and impunity remain rampant.

title: Arab leaders condemn Israeli escalation in Lebanon
What to know about Hezbollah, the group targeted by Israel in Lebanon
content: Hezbollah is one of the most powerful militant groups in the Middle East, a major political and social force in Lebanon, and a decades-long opponent of Israel.

title: Hundreds of Israeli airstrikes pound Lebanon, killing 492
